text:
Linux users here?
 `echo "main(i){for(i=0;;i++)putchar(((i*(i>>8|i>>9)&46&i>>8))^(i&i>>13|i>>6));}" | gcc -x c - && ./a.out | aplay` 

Copy and paste in the terminal... and hit enter....:slightly_smiling_face:

elements.text: Copy and paste in the terminal... and hit enter....

text:
```affan ➤ echo "main(i){for(i=0;;i++)putchar(((i*(i>>8|i>>9)&46&i>>8))^(i&i>>13|i>>6));}" | gcc -x c - && ./a.out | aplay
<stdin>:1:1: warning: return type defaults to 'int' [-Wimplicit-int]
<stdin>: In function 'main':
<stdin>:1:1: warning: type of 'i' defaults to 'int' [-Wimplicit-int]
<stdin>:1:22: warning: implicit declaration of function 'putchar' [-Wimplicit-function-declaration]
zsh: command not found: aplay```
